quiz_item.error_analysis: 易因形近词"monotony"(单调)的拼写联想产生混淆，或因词根"poly"（误判为"多"）导致对"单一控制"词义的偏离
quiz_item.sentence: The company holds a **monopoly** on smartphone operating systems, so no other brand can use the same software legally.
